name: Pydocs
tagline: Various documents relating to radiative transfer and the radative transfer code Python
body:
### Pydocs
Documents I've used as part of My Phd, relating to Python's implementation of radiative transfer.

[Adiabatic Cooling (div V derivation)](http://jhmatthews.github.io/pydocs/adiab.pdf)

[Adiabatic Cooling (KSL derivation)](http://jhmatthews.github.io/pydocs/EnergyLossFromAdiabaticExpansion.pdf)

[H vs O (NSH derivation for Proga model)](http://jhmatthews.github.io/pydocs/H_vs_O.pdf)

[Glossary of Ionization Terms](http://jhmatthews.github.io/pydocs/ion_glossary.pdf)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
